name: User Story
about: Create a user story for the GiftLink project
title: ''
labels: backlog
assignees: ''
---

## User Story 1 (Label: new)
As a user, I want to register an account so I can access gift recommendations.

## User Story 2 (Label: backlog)
As a user, I want to login so that I can save my preferences.

## User Story 3 (Label: icebox)
As a user, I want to search gifts by category so I can find relevant items.

## User Story 4 (Label: backlog)
As a user, I want to view gift details so I can decide before purchasing.

## User Story 5 (Label: technical debt)
As a developer, I want to optimize database queries to improve performance.

## User Story 6 (Label: new)
As a user, I want to see all gifts on the homepage.

## User Story 7 (Label: backlog)
As a user, I want to see my username after login.

## User Story 8 (Label: icebox)
As an admin, I want to manage gift listings.
